RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 21. Maiden Claiming Purse 18900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS MARY JEAN bore out at the start, pressed the pace four then two wide, dug in late and got up in the final strides. THELMA LUCILLE dueled for the lead three wide then inside the entire trip, gained a narrow lead and just missed hanging on. GHOSTLY REVIVAL never far back, closed some ground late in the seven path. RIVERANDFAIRMOUNT hit the gate at the start, trailed through the turn, swung wide and passed tiring rivals in the middle of the racetrack. MY TWO JAKES battled for the lead along the rail until late on the turn then was was used up. CABARET FLEUR dueled for the lead two wide until late on the turn then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: My Two Jakes
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled rail, late turn, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Ghostly Revival
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late gain 7path

ENTRY.NAME: Cabaret Fleur
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide late turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Riverandfairmount
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate start, trailed, swung wide, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Thelma Lucille
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 3 wide, inside, led late, just failed,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Mary Jean
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Urieta Johanna
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out start, pressed pace, 4-2wide, up in final strides,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 10 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Fo als Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEAM GOLD DIGGER never far back, closed willingly three wide into the stretch, made the lead at the furlong marker and finished full of run to win going away under brisk handling. TIME FOR CUPID pressed the pace two wide and finished second best. YEARS AGO broke in front, set the pace inside rivals to mid stretch then was outfinished. V K STAR inside, had no rally. DANZING CHICK hopped at the start and was no threat. O K BABY stalked the early pace and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: O K Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Danzing Chick
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: V K Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Team Gold Digger
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly, 3 wide, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Years Ago
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace mid stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Time for Cupid
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 16400. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRACIE DANCE prompted the pace two wide past the quarter pole, made the lead at the top of the stretch, was put to right handed pressure and drew off under a strong hand ride to win as much the best. COROMANDEL away alertly, set the pace along the inside to the top of the stretch then was no match for the winner. SOLDAT TEMPTATION never far back, had a mild late rally two wide. JUMP INTO SANITY settled inside and went evenly. SWAMP WITCH HADDY failed to menace. KRISTIN was never close.

ENTRY.NAME: Soldat Temptation
ENTRY.COMMENT: mild rally late 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Jump Into Sanity
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Kristin
ENTRY.COMMENT: never close

ENTRY.NAME: Coromandel
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace inside, 3/16pole no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Gracie Dance
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, assumed command 3/16pole, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Swamp Witch Haddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 90. Claiming Purse 16300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 10 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GEHRIG unhurried early, closed rapidly four wide through the stretch, was carried out to the middle of the racetrack by the runner up through upper stretch, made the lead late and drew clear. MR LIGHTNING BOY stalked the early pace, rallied three wide through the turn to make the lead entering the stretch, drifted out to the eight path under left handed urging then couldn't handle the winner. PAT DADDY close up from the start, swung widest of all, angled inside the top pair near the furlong marker and went evenly. KHALFANI failed to menace. UHAVETOBEKITTENME dueled for the lead two wide into the stretch then gave way. TUFF ATTACK matched strides for the lead along the rail for a half then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Tuff Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, stopped lane

ENTRY.NAME: Gehrig
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, closed fast 4 wide turn, carried mid track, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Khalfani
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Pat Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, swung wide, angled in mid stretch, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Uhavetobekittenme
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 2 wide, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Lightning Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, rallied 3 wide turn, drifted 8path, left urging, 2best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 16000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 10 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRACTICAL MAN prompted the pace three wide into the turn, gained a narrow lead near the quarter pole, drifted to the six path and proved best in a stiff drive while fully extended. AWESOME ENOUGH close up from the start, rallied four wide through the turn engaging the winner at the top of the stretch, drifted to the seven path and finished second best. UNCLEJACKOMO trailed early then had a mild late rally in the three path. GOLD HERITAGE offered a mild bid near the inside approaching the quarter pole then weakened late. MASTER away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside for nearly a half then was used up. MURTAGH pressed the pace two wide down the backstretch and gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Enough
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, rallied 4 wide turn, drifted 7path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Heritage
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside bid 1/4 pole, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Master
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace turn, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Unclejackomo
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, mild rally late 3path

ENTRY.NAME: Murtagh
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, gave way turn

ENTRY.NAME: Practical Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, short lead turn, drifted 6path, all out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 18300. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE JUNE 10, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 10 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since April 10 Allowed 4 lb s. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROSCO P. COLTRANE raced in the six path into the clubhouse turn, stalked the pace three wide, went up to engage the leaders nearing the quarter pole, battled the length of the stretch two wide and proved best under right handed urging in a game effort. SPIN DOCTOR pressed the pace along the rail into the far turn, gained a narrow lead at the quarter pole, set the balance of the pace under pressured from the winner and just missed hanging on. NAMBITI entering the first turn in the five path, ser a pressured pace two wide for six furlongs then was outfinished. DEER CREEK ROAD failed to menace. HANSENATION was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Spin Doctor
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed, inside, assumed command 1/4 p, long drive, just failed,

ENTRY.NAME: Hansenation
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Nambiti
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5path first turn, set pressured pace, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Deer Creek Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Rosco P. Coltrane
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6path first turn, vied 3w, engaged 1/4 pole, long drive, gamely,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 10 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since April 10 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,50 0 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY GIRL MELLY tracked the pace from the inside, slipped through at the quarter pole to make the lead then widened the balance of the trip under mild urging to win as much the best. UNESCORTED away alertly, the pace for six furlongs, drifted to the five path entering the stretch and was no match for the winner. PLAYFUL SUMMER stalked the early pace three wide, inched closer nearing the half mile marker, kept close into the stretch then faded. WHAT KNOT failed to menace. CONDUTTORE stumbled badly at the start, moved closer in the three path before a half then was used up. MORE MUCHO pressed the early pace two wide and was through after a half. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: More Mucho
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: My Girl Melly
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, slipped through 1/4 pole, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Conduttore
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled badly start, middle move 3path used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Unescorted
ENTRY.OWNER: Mace Ed and Urieta's Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 1/4 pole, drifted 5path, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Playful Summer
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3 wide, inched closer 1/2 pole, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: What Knot
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 70. Allowance Purse 38400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 10 Allowe d 2 lbs. A Race Since April 10 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUMBLE STRIP RON pressed the pace two wide then along the inside, made the lead at the quarter pole then drew off under left handed urging to win as much the best while taken in hand late. RAISE THE PURSES had speed from the start three wide, dropped back after a quarter then came on again late in the four path and finished clear for second. WORTHY OPPONENT trailed while never far back and passed tiring rivals late in the five path. LONE BOY pressed the pace along the inside into the turn then weakened in the stretch. KEEPING SCORE broke in front, set a pressured pace two wide for a half then weakened. CONDEMNATION was a sharp threat three wide into the stretch then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Lone Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Rumble Strip Ron
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, drew off, handily,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Pick View LLC, Paul W. Schaffer & William D. Pickerrell

ENTRY.NAME: Worthy Opponent
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, close up, passed tiring rivals 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Raise the Purses
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 3 wide, dropped back, came again 4path

ENTRY.NAME: Condemnation
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC WinStar Farm LLC and Check Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Keeping Score
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace 2wide 1/4 pole, weakened,
